name: Cracked Pyramid
description: A massive pyramid that once served as a tomb or temple now shows signs of structural damage and decay. The architectural marvels and potential hidden chambers attract explorers and scholars, while the ancient magic and historical significance create opportunities for discovery and danger.
atmosphere: Footsteps echo through chambers that once housed kings and gods. Air carries ancient magic, architectural marvels, and lost civilizations dust scent. Massive pyramid rises with cracked sides like wounded giant reaching toward heavens. Skin tingles with sense of hidden chambers and architectural marvels. Taste of ancient magic and historical significance fills mouth. Weight of ancient power and structural decay presses down on you.
